tapinfo.py¶

SYNOPSIS¶

tapinfo.py [options] FILE

DESCRIPTION¶

tapinfo.py shows information on the blocks in a PZX, TAP or TZX file.

OPTIONS¶

-b, –basic N[,A]

List the BASIC program in block number N loaded at address A (default 23755). A must be a decimal number, or a hexadecimal number prefixed by ‘0x’.

-d, --data

Show the entire contents of header and data blocks.

–tape-start BLOCK

Start at this tape block number.

–tape-stop BLOCK

Stop at this tape block number.

-V, --version

Show the SkoolKit version number and exit.

EXAMPLES¶

  1. Show information on all the blocks in game.tzx:


tapinfo.py game.tzx

  1. List the BASIC program in the second block in game.tap:


tapinfo.py -b 2 game.tap
